meta.hint: Past tense verbs tell about something that has already happened.  To make a past tense verb, you usually just add -ed. walk → walked eg. We walked to the shops yesterday.  If the verb already ends with an -e, you just add -d. bake → baked eg. Jane baked a cake last week.
